text: And let not those who are stingy/miserly with what God gave them from His grace/blessing think/suppose it is good/better for them, but it is bad/evil for them, they will be encircled/surrounded (with) what they were stingy/miser with it (on) the Resurrection Day, and to God (are) the skies`/space`s and the earth`s/Planet Earth`s inheritance , and God (is) with what you make/do, expert/experienced
